title: Any area required or proposed for the purpose of construction of temporary or permanent transit camp
clause_text: Any area required or proposed for the purpose of construction of temporary or permanent transit camps and so approved by the SRA shall also be deemed to be and treated as Slum Rehabilitation Areas, and projects approved in such areas by the SRA shall be deemed to be Slum Rehabilitation Projects.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, and Structure of hut:

source_pdf.text_snippet: Any area required or proposed for the purpose of construction of temporary or permanent transit camps and so approved by the SRA shall also be deemed to be and treated as Slum Rehabilitation Areas,
